caption.title: Obese mice have reduced chronic RNA levels.
caption.p: Groups of C57BL/6N mice (7 mice per group) were fed either a 45% fat (Obese), 5% protein (LP), or control (Lean) diet for 8–10 weeks. Mice were then infected with Mayaro virus (MAYV) and after 65 days post-infection footpads were collected. Viral RNA was quantified using qRT-PCR. The whiskers represent the minimum and maximum points, the box limits represent the 25 th and 75 th percentile, and the horizontal line represents the median. Statistical analyses were performed by one-way ANOVA with Dunnett’s correction compared to the control group. The level of significance is represented as follows—* p<0.05.
